chess

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    The Piece class outlines the methods that the various chess pieces utilize
    Author:
    Justin Saganowski, Emily Tregelles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean isValidPath(Tile start, Tile end)
      The isValidPath method checks if the path taken by a piece from start to end tile is legal
      abstract boolean move_check(Tile end)
      The move_check method determines if a move is legal
      abstract void move(Tile end)
      The move method checks if it is a valid move and that the end tile is currently reachable by the piece.
      abstract Tile[] possibleMove()
      The possibleMove method determines which locations on the board can be legally reached by the piece
      abstract boolean validOutOfCheck(Tile end_tile)
      The validOutOfCheck method checks if moving a king to the specified tile will successfully get it out of check

    • Method Detail

      • isValidPath

        public abstract boolean isValidPath(Tile start,
                                    Tile end)
        The isValidPath method checks if the path taken by a piece from start to end tile is legal
        Parameters:
        start - tile where piece is currently located
        end - destination tile of piece
        Returns:
        boolean

      • move

        public abstract void move(Tile end)
        The move method checks if it is a valid move and that the end tile is currently reachable by the piece. If so, update the currentTile to the end tile.
        Parameters:
        end - tile destination tile

      • possibleMove

        public abstract Tile[] possibleMove()
        The possibleMove method determines which locations on the board can be legally reached by the piece
        Returns:
        array of tiles that piece can legally move to

      • validOutOfCheck

        public abstract boolean validOutOfCheck(Tile end_tile)
        The validOutOfCheck method checks if moving a king to the specified tile will successfully get it out of check
        Parameters:
        end_tile - end tile of king piece
        king_color - color of king
        Returns:
        boolean

      • move_check

        public abstract boolean move_check(Tile end)
        The move_check method determines if a move is legal
        Parameters:
        end - destination tile
        Returns:
        boolean
